attributes.action: stop removing petitions unless they already exist or countain explicit language
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too stop the removal of petitions from this site. As it seems you are using this to censor legitimate views are expressed by the public on this site.

rejection.details: Petitions are only removed at the request of the creator, or where the terms and conditions of the petitions website have been breached. Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
